meanings.definition: A sum of money given by an organization, especially a government, for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The government provides grants for students to attend college.
meanings.sent2: She applied for grants to fund her research project.
meanings.sent3: The grants for new playground equipment made the children very happy.
meanings.sent4: The grants acted as a financial lifeline for the struggling community.
meanings.sent5: Receiving grants can make a big difference in achieving your goals.

meanings.definition: Agree to give or allow (something requested) to.
meanings.sent1: He grants permission for the students to go on a field trip.
meanings.sent2: The committee decided to grant her request for additional funding.
meanings.sent3: The teacher grants extra recess time as a reward for good behavior.
meanings.sent4: She grants forgiveness to those who apologize sincerely.
meanings.sent5: Granting opportunities can lead to positive outcomes for everyone involved.

meanings.definition: A legal conveyance or transfer of property.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer handled the grant of the property to the new owner.
meanings.sent2: The grant of land was recorded in the official documents.
meanings.sent3: The grant of the estate was a complex legal process.
meanings.sent4: She inherited the house through a grant in the will.
meanings.sent5: The grant of ownership was a significant moment for the family.
